search_queries: How many states are in the United States official 50 states USA.gov
USA.gov how many states 50 states 'USA has 50 states' site:usa.gov 'states'
How many states are in the United States 50 states official '50 states' usa.gov 'states and territories' '50' '51'

REASONING: Wikipedia (List of states and territories of the United States) states: "The United States of America is a federal republic consisting of 50 states, a federal district (Washington, D.C., the capital city of the United States), five major territories..." — showing there are 50 states, not 51. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_states_and_territories_of_the_United_States)
Britannica (United States) describes the U.S. as "a federal republic of 50 states," confirming the commonly accepted count of 50 states. (https://www.britannica.com/place/United-States)

U.S. Geological Survey (a U.S. government source) defines "United States" in official definitions as "The 50 States and the District of Columbia," which is an authoritative government usage indicating 50 states. (https://www.usgs.gov/faqs/what-constitutes-united-states-what-are-official-definitions)
Given multiple authoritative sources (encyclopedic and U.S. government) consistently state there are 50 states, the claim "There are 51 states in America" is incorrect.
